name: Shall we date?: Wizardess Heart
storyline:
Welcome to the most prominent academy for wizards in the universe, Gedonelune Royal Magic Academy!

Wizardess Heart+ is a visual novel game with full of fantasy, adventure, love romance and school life in the wizardry world! The game is set at the magic academy for wizards, and you, as a provisional wizard student, tries to get accepted to be officially enrolled in the academy as you learn about magic, use magical items and cast spells. You’ll be meeting with unique classmates, dormmate, professors and some magical creatures in the academy. Your school life at the academy is sure to be thrilling and adventurous with a sweet romance and swoon moments!
